front.title: Extensions to Delivery Status Notifications for Fax

abstract.t: The Internet fax specification [RFC2305] describes a simple mode of operation for fax over SMTP. [EIFAX] requires that offramp gateways implemented using SMTP implement DSN [RFC1891], and this document provides extensions to message format of delivery status notifications [RFC1894] and error codes [RFC1893] to provide better support for fax offramps implemented as SMTP servers.
